intro: This section highlights the vibrant and crucial role of Palestinian youth in leading resistance efforts, advocating for their rights, and shaping the future of Palestine.

profiles.name: Ahed Tamimi
profiles.bio: A Palestinian activist from Nabi Salih, West Bank, known for her activism against the Israeli occupation. She gained international recognition for confronting Israeli soldiers.

profiles.name: Mohammed El-Kurd
profiles.bio: A Palestinian writer and activist from Sheikh Jarrah, East Jerusalem, known for his advocacy against the forced displacement of Palestinian families.

actions.title: Global Youth Solidarity Day for Palestine
